channel.title: How to make multiple teleports in one spell?
channel.description:
Well my spells from the mage book take you to the place directly when you click it. I want it so when I click lets say the Varrock Teleport, it wil do this: [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/wj9ik6.jpg[/img] My the code I have set up in my clickingbuttons.java is
case 50253: //train tele c.getPA().startTeleport(3088, 3494, 0, "ancient"); break;
If you don't already know i'm using PI.

item.title: How to make multiple teleports in one spell?
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

I have no clue how to do that, I’ve been trying for the past 2 hours. I even tried the tutorial but I couldn’t follow it. Didn’t really make sense.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make multiple teleports in one spell?

item.title: How to make multiple teleports in one spell?
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Just change the Varrock tele to a sendoption. Here is a link for a tutorial. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=509470.0

Read full topic
